title: im being blackmailed
body: today i logged into my leage account to fine my rune pages had been changed to someone asking me for money or my account would be gone ($200) i went to check my email linked to the account and it had been changed....... what do i do.....

replies.body: not sure about giving that kind of infomation out are you a mod admind what ever?
i have the old one linked to the account old as in 1 week ago
okay well the account i spent well over 2k on and 3 years is now gone riot bearly help even tho i have all the info ty to everyone who helped <3 fuck heads
